chunk:
Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion (2019 formulation)

Brand: Cetaphil

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, DICAPRYLYL CARBONATE, HYDROXYETHYL UREA, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, GLYCERIN, GLYCERYL STEARATE, PEG-100 STEARATE, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, HOMARINE HCL, SODIUM PCA, CETYL ALCOHOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, PHENOXYET

YL GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, ERYTHRITOL

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
